sentences.en: "All of us together, in that beautiful place, " one attendee recalls.
sentences.cn: “我们聚在在那个美丽的地方，”一位出席聚会的员工回忆。

sentences.en: Another theme that came up -- and that, as one attendee pointed out, is of particular interest as colleges look for ways to cut costs -- is the value of counseling centers.
sentences.cn: 新的问题出现了，正如一位大会出席者指出的那样，由于各高校目前正在寻求方法消减开支，学校咨询中心就被首先考虑到了。

sentences.en: Edits the role of the attendee selected in the list above.
sentences.cn: 编辑以上列表中所选参加者的角色.

sentences.en: Enter attendee and registration information before previewing the invoice.
sentences.cn: 请在预览发票之前输入参加者和报名信息.

sentences.en: Enter attendee information before registering for an event.
sentences.cn: 注册事件之前请输入参加人信息.

sentences.en: Even North Korea's most senior attendee, Vice - President Yang Hyong Sop, readily got to his feet.
sentences.cn: 即使最高级别的朝鲜方出席者, 最高人民会议常任委员会副委员长杨亨燮也起身鼓掌.

sentences.en: Every attendee at this 1991 conference of computer graphic experts was probably once hooked on Pong.
sentences.cn: 参加1991年这次会议的计算机图形专家们,可能都曾经迷恋过“乒乓”游戏.

sentences.en: Folios will be prepared for each attendee and left by their namecards on the conference table.
sentences.cn: 会场会替每位出席者准备文件夹,跟名牌一起摆在会议桌上.

sentences.en: Register attendee for an event before viewing payments form.
sentences.cn: 请在查看付款窗体之前给讲座的参加者报名.

sentences.en: This attendee has tentatively accepted the meeting.
sentences.cn: 此与会者已暂时接受了会议要求.

sentences.en: Training materials will be selected based on attendee's test results and the company's goals.
sentences.cn: 结合受训人员测试结果和企业培训目标,选定系列培训教材.

sentences.en: Your status an attendee of this event changed.
sentences.cn: 您在此事件的参加者状态已变更.

words.tran_cn: 出席者；按规定常到的人；常客
出席；上（大学等）；照料；招待；陪伴

trans.tran_en: someone who is at an event such as a meeting or a course
